data.message:
I need a respond in getting back my original user name. 

I am not 'Afrag Abdelazizi Ibrahim '
I am *Sharon Koay*

Im suspecting the hacker is still trying to reset password to login again! 
I feel very insecure!!!

replies.message: Hey there. Please go to the Hacked Accounts section to get immediate help: http://bit.ly/2ypTrwG. Additionally, you can learn how to keep your account safe by creating a secure password. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2hjOajy. -Brittany

Facebook I got back my account. My only problem is getting my previous user name. Afrag Abdelazizi Ibrahim is not my name at all. How do I change it back to my original user name? The link you provide is not useful at all

Facebook My account was hacked not via my password but from an old email account which was used to link to facebook. The hacker was able to convince the Facebook Support to get new password and change my user name. I need help to change back to my old user name. 😥
